headline: ITEC POWERTRON 1500 WATT CURRENT SOURCE
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > Other Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer ITEC Powertron
Model 3000S-CR
Description Current Source -- 1500W
Interface Other
Panel Meters None
External Cooling Air Cooled
Accessories Unit can be upgraded to the model 3000S-CRH (hall effect sensing)
Other Information

Output Circut: Isolated output transformer
Regulation: 1% line and load
Frequency Response: 30Hz to 5KHz.
Short Circut Protection: Automatic reset thermostat
Distortion: 0.3% mid band
Power Factor Range: +0.7 to -0.7 for full power to zero at reduced power

Can easily be wired for 190, 225, 240, 380, or 450V; 50/60Hz
Power Requirements 208 V 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 22.500 in (57.2 cm)
Height 17.500 in (44.5 cm)
Weight 225 lb (102 kg)
